column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////But before we get to the pizza
column2: which is making me drool just thinking about
column3: we also ordered 2 orders of mozzarella sticks and a large Malnati salad to munch on while waiting for the pizzas. The mozzarella sticks were just normal apps that you can get anywhere
column5: but someone at the table really wanted them. But the salad ... oh the salad. It was delicious! Normally I don't like sweet Italian dressings
column6: but it balances out the saltiness of the salami
column8: and cheese very well. I had to stop eating the salad knowing the pizza was coming.
